revised_title: Electrical Organs and Development in Torpedo Fish
tldr: The author investigates the reproductive and embryonic development of the torpedo fish, focusing on the electrical organs and the process of ovoviviparity. They describe the anatomy of the fish, the role of the electrical organs, and the stages of development from egg to mature fish. The author also discusses the differences between ovoviviparity and viviparity and provides statistical data on the weight of eggs and embryos.
